entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon then north 30 gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
